snippet: A new residence hall, La Casa, offers commuter students from Chicago’s South Side a safe, quiet place to eat, sleep and study.
abstract: Nonprofit organization Resurrection Project has built dormitory for commuter students from Chicago's tougher neighborhoods to eat, sleep and study in safety and quiet; dormitory La Casa houses students attending a number of different colleges in the city.
lead_paragraph: A new residence hall, La Casa, offers commuter students from Chicago’s South Side a safe, quiet place to eat, sleep and study.

headline.seo: Dorm Offers Safe Haven for Commuter Students from Chicago’s South Side
